ignoreCommand: echo "VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF=$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF"; if [ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" != "dev" ] && [ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" != "staging" ] && [ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" != "main" ]; then echo "ðŸ›‘ Skipping build on branch: $VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF"; exit 0; else echo "âœ… Proceeding with build on branch: $VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF"; fi
